CMS_BRANCH_BREADCRUMBS.title:
Branch
<#=bcrumbs.branch_desc||' '#>
CMS_BRANCH_BREADCRUMBS.sql: select branch_id, branch_desc, v_my_branch_desc.site_id, site_default_page_template_id, sys_user_site_editor, site_editor from {schema}.v_my_branch_desc inner join {schema}.site on site.site_id = v_my_branch_desc.site_id inner join {schema}.v_my_site on v_my_site.site_id = v_my_branch_desc.site_id where branch_id={schema}.my_current_branch_id()

lov.sql: select site_id code_parent, deployment_target_id code_val, deployment_target_name code_txt from {schema}.v_my_deployment_target where deployment_target_can_editor = 1 and deployment_target_sts='ACTIVE' and site_id = {schema}.my_current_site_id() order by deployment_target_name
